Source.Name: vala-language-server
Source.Summary: vala-language-server is a language server for the Vala programming language.
Source.Description: vala-language-server is a language server for the Vala programming language. It makes many development features available in IDEs with language server support like diagnostics, goto definition, code lenses, inlay hints, and more.
